title: (x) Topic titles on Typophile - Gotham {Dav}
content:
Hi,

I know we already discussed the typeface on the Typophile homepage, but I would like to know what’s the font used in this post title.

Is it a font that we can use in HTML ? Is it some kind of funky css option that gives you the right to use the typeface of your choice ?

yeah !
author: cedilla

comments.content:
‘ [Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001222/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/gotham/index.html)’, _by Tobias Frere Jones_..

_( Oh, and its some kind of ‘Funky Dynamic Flash Option’ :), alike ‘ [sIFR](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001222/http:/www.mikeindustries.com/sifr/)’, that gives you the right to use the typeface of your choice, but its defined by the site, not its users.. )_
